Nick Diego

@ndiego on WordPress.org, @Nick Diego on Slack 









Member Since:
August 22nd, 2013


Location:
Minneapolis, MN


Website:
nickdiego.com


GitHub:
ndiego


Job Title:
Developer Relations Advocate


Employer:
Automattic


Find me on:





 

Bio

Hi there, my name is Nick. I’m a Developer Relations Advocate, WordPress Core contributor, and plugin developer. Most of my projects are centered around block themes and plugins, many of which are freely available here on WordPress.org.


				Contributions
									Sponsored


Automattic sponsors Nick Diego to contribute 40 hours per week to the following teams: Core, Documentation, and Training. 


Contribution History

			Meta Contributor					


			Plugin Developer					


			Test Contributor					


			Training Contributor					


			WordCamp Speaker
